message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. It's a good offer for you considering the inflation.
I think we can both do better. I'll take a little more this time, but let's split it more fairly. This is a better deal for both of us.
Bob, time is money!  I'll take a little less than my first offer, you get a little more. This is fair and we both lose less to inflation if we settle now.
